title: How to Get Rid of Spectacle Marks on Your Nose

steps.title: Use potatoes.
steps.content: Use potatoes. Potatoes are perfect for treating marks because they're commonplace in homes. Peel one raw potato and then grate it well. Add some pure rose water to it and make a smooth paste. You can also add lemon extract or pure honey for improving the strength of the remedy. Apply the mix and let it sink in. Wash with water after 15 minutes and repeat regularly. Potatoes have bleaching properties which will reduce dark circles. [ citation needed ]

steps.title: Try aloe vera.
steps.content: Try aloe vera. Aloe vera has numerous beauty benefits and also helps remove spectacle marks. [ citation needed ] Cut a fresh aloe vera leaf and then squeeze out the jelly. Apply it to the area and let is sit for 30 minutes. Wash it off with water and notice the difference.

steps.title: Use lemons.
steps.content: Use lemons. You can take a fresh lemon, squeeze out the juice, and add some pure rose water to dilute the astringent. Apply the mix onto your face and let it sit for 15 minutes. Repeat it daily and watch the marks disappear. Lemon lightens skin and makes the face look natural. The citrus essence also helps treat the marks. [ citation needed ]

steps.title: Use orange peels.
steps.content: Use orange peels. Rather than throwing away orange peels, make use of them. Grind dried orange and then add almond oil. Make a paste with both and then apply to the darkened zone. Let it dry out and then wash it with cold water. Almond oil includes vitamin E which nourishes the skin while the orange peel lightens your face. [ citation needed ]

steps.title: Try cucumbers.
steps.content: Try cucumbers. Take a fresh cucumber and cut it into thick slices. Chill them in your refrigerator. Take them out and then apply them to the affected area. Let it sit for some time and see the difference once you dab your face with a towel. [ citation needed ]

steps.title: Use apple cider vinegar.
steps.content: Use apple cider vinegar. Get pure and good-quality apple cider vinegar and then mix it with water to dilute it. Take cotton balls and apply on the affected area. Watch the marks fade away with time. [ citation needed ]

steps.title: Try almond oil.
steps.content: Try almond oil. You can apply almond oil and leave it on overnight. Just make sure that it is pure and rich and that you are consistent with the application. Apply it every night until you get results. [ citation needed ]

steps.title: Use rose water.
steps.content: Use rose water. Add rose water with vinegar and then apply it to the dark circles. The marks will reduce soon and make your face suppler. [ citation needed ]

steps.title: Try honey.
steps.content: Try honey. Honey is a well-known moisturizer, and mixing milk, honey, and oats can further boost the healing effect. The combination is known to reduce spectacle marks instantly. Apply it once a day over a week to get rid of the marks. [ citation needed ]
